name: TheCityUK
goal: TheCityUK works to promote a globally competitive UK Financial and related Professional Serives sector, building evidence to demonstrate the sector's contribution to society and sustainable economic growth.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Economy, finance and the euro, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: The main issues for TheCityUK include the various activities our members undertake that are regulated by the EU Institutions. These issues include clearing and settlement, capital requirements, accounting standards, tax rules, retail banking activities such as consumer credit, bank accounts, financial inclusion and education, as well as collective redress, and rules on supervision of credit institutions - cross-border and national.
